profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.text: Computer Engineer and Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in high-criticality systems. Expert in Golang, Java, Microservices, and Software Architecture with consolidated experience at Mercado Libre, Sovos, and Globant.

tasks: Design and development of critical back-end services in Golang for the Credits business unit.
Implementation of Datadog dashboards and ELK Stack logging, ensuring 99.9% uptime.
Leading proactive payment initiatives for Brazil and preparing architecture for Banxico audits.
Cybersecurity mentorship as part of the Security Guardians team.
Led technical strategy and architectural roadmaps for multiple projects.
Technical reference for multidisciplinary teams, implementing Pair Programming and code reviews.
Critical decisions on distributed systems design and microservices in Java and Spring.
Designed robust integration products connecting ERPs with core services.
Optimized CI/CD flows using Jenkins, Puppet, and Docker for frequent deployments.
Transitioned legacy modules to modern microservices architecture.
Implementation of high-concurrency solutions for Crew Scheduling (Southwest Airlines).
Responsible for full life cycle of mission-critical legacy applications.
Designed a communication Proxy for incompatible protocols (3C Interactive).
